Phantom GX Elite FG - Hyper Pink/White
description: An evolution of the Phantom GT II, the Phantom GX arrives as a boot that is fine-tuned for perfect precision on pitch. Created for the laser-guided through balls of the number 10 while adding an injection of power and accuracy for the number 9s on the end of those passes.

description: Known for their quality and craftsmanship, Mizuno football boots are the pinnacle of boot design for many players. That’s especially the case with their “Made in Japan” leather boots, which are handcrafted from the most premium materials. They’re so good, some players won’t wear anything else.
